author: Andrew Welfle

comments.content: I atteneded SXSW earlier this year, but missed the sold-out premiere of _Helvetica_. Thankfully I was able to attend a later screening in Chicago with Gary Hustwit on hand to add his anecdotes. A DVD should be released soon (possibly October), but I’d highly recommend seeing this documentary in a cinema to show your support for these types of films.
When does it come to the UK?

Andrew, it is a really great film. I saw it the second time on Wednesday and highly recommend you see it.

missgiggles, the event dates and info is on the official site. [http://www.helveticafilm.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907034928/http:/www.helveticafilm.com/ "http://www.helveticafilm.com/")

\>_When does it come to the UK?_

Rumour has it that it may be shown in Brighton, during the annual conference of [ATypI](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907034928/http:/www.atypi.org/05_Brighton).

It is scheduled for 7 September at the ICA\*, but was shown in Oxford a couple of nights ago at  
 [https://www.britdoc.org/festival/filmscompetition/british#helvetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907034928/https:/www.britdoc.org/festival/filmscompetition/british#helvetica "https://www.britdoc.org/festival/filmscompetition/british#helvetica")

\*annoyingly the ICA website restricts itself to 31 days in the future.

Tim

I heard the ATypI rummor too - check the site for updates... [http://www.helveticafilm.com/screenings.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907034928/http:/www.helveticafilm.com/screenings.html "http://www.helveticafilm.com/screenings.html")

Oh and the new DVD release date... Nov 6.

ICA London preview September 1 = sold out.

ICA London cinema run starts September 7 = [http://www.ica.org.uk/Helvetica+14863.twl](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907034928/http:/www.ica.org.uk/Helvetica+14863.twl "http://www.ica.org.uk/Helvetica+14863.twl")

ATypI rumor = true. September 16th screening in Brighton just confirmed.

Cheers!

-Gary
